name: Drill Deeper (remram44)
description:
Submission to Ludum Dare 48. First ever jam!

A tactical RTS about collecting resources from caves as you go deeper into the Earth aboard your drilling ship.

Press 1, 2, 3 to select a character (or click a character, or his icon on the left)
Right click to move, attack, or mine resources
WASD, arrows, or middle-click-and-drag to pan the camera
Enter to drill down! (or click blinking button in top right)

The source can be found on GitLab
